msbt.message: I'm gonna stare up at the sky with my mouth open till I catch a shooting star! Yummy cosmic rocks
Man, shooting stars are real pretty! Butwon't the sky run out of stars if they keep falling?!
My wish? I wanna know my friends are happy, and a tummy full of tasty food!
Do rainbows taste like sno-cones? Red's strawberry, yellow's lemon, and blue is blue-flavor! My favorite!
Man, the rainbows I make with my watering can are way smaller than the real thing! I need a bigger can
Didja know that rainbows show up after the rain so the clouds can relax after doing all that hard work?
Whoa, two rainbows? I didn't know you could do two at the same time! Huh. I hope nothing's broken
When I see a double rainbow, I always wonder if they know each other and are just chilling.
I wanna take a picture of the rainbow! But I can't remember where I put my camera
Ooh, the rainbow curtain is swaying! It's so pretty, ! I could watch it forever!
A big curtain of light across the sky Man, I usually only see stuff like that if I've been awake for a couple days!
I want a curtain made of lights in my house! I could sit and stare at it all night!
Ooh, a vapor trail! Who's on the plane?
Vapor trails are so funny! They're like plane footprints!
Do you think maybe vapor trails are really planes making cotton candy?<10_4 /> Man, I want some cotton candy.
Doesn't the moon remind you of something? All yellow and round Oh! Big, buttery PANCAKES!
Is it true the moon is made of cheese? And that if we got there, we'd have ALL THE CHEESE?
The moon is round like a pizza, and I love pizza. I'm hungry enough, I could fit the moon in my belly.
